name: Moroccan Chicken Wings
preparation: In a mixing bowl, whisk together marinade ingredients. Add wings, tossing to coat. Wings can be cooked immediately or marinated in refrigerator for up to 24 hours.
To cook, arrange prepared wings on a parchment-lined Sheet Pan and bake for 20 minutes. Broil wings for 30 minutes on each side, or until crisp and brown.
tips: 2 lbs (1 kg) chicken wings equals approximately 25 - 30 wings. If you buy whole wings, remove tips and freeze until the next time you need to make prepared Epicure Nourish Bouillon. Split wings at the joint to make 2 pieces.
Serve with your choice of our wonderful Epicure Dips.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
